name: PARAGLIDER
description:
Playing with a Controller is recommended.

You can also play on mobile, but a controller is needed.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Made by UnityMember using Godot 3.2.2 for the MizJam 1 Gamejam in 48 hours (non consecutive)

Sprites by Kenney (1-Bit Pack)

Font by Yuji Adachi (Arcade)

Music by Azureflux (The Precession of the Equinoxes in the Inverted Alps)

SFX by OwlStorm (https://freesound.org/people/OwlStorm/sounds/404794/)
                 Mativve (https://freesound.org/people/Mativve/sounds/414329/)
                 stomachache (https://freesound.org/people/stomachache/sounds/29813/)
                 jeckkech (https://freesound.org/people/jeckkech/sounds/391655/)
                 Free-Rush (https://freesound.org/people/Free-Rush/sounds/336933/)
                 Mike Koenig (http://soundbible.com/2108-Shoot-Arrow.html)

SPECIAL THANKS to Miziziziz for hosting the event.
